title: 소프트웨어 프로토타이핑 수업 - 인터랙티브 웹(JS) 프로젝트 수업
contents:
2025 봄학기 Software Prototyping (안드리아 비앙키 교수님) 수업은 코딩 (웹개발, javascript, node.js)을 배우고 싶거나, 개발+디자인 프로젝트를 경험해보고 싶은 분들에게 좋은 기회입니다. 많은 관심 부탁드립니다 :) 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j_NC-y-4HFk&list=PLj09SPA0jmLUA6f0Cgs_qUy_kl6qZmz-b&index=23 
Are you interested in coding? Do you want to learn properly how to get started with JavaScript, web development, and Node.js but do not have much prior coding experience? Are you a designer who wants to build a portfolio with interactive programs? Then consider taking ID311 Software Prototyping this spring semester. This course is part of a series focused on prototyping: - Interaction Prototyping (ID220, offered in Fall) - Software Prototyping (ID311, offered in Spring) - AI Prototyping (offered in Fall) Overview This Software Prototyping (ID311) course offered in the Department of Industrial Design at KAIST aims to provide students with the theoretical and practical programming background to develop software for the web. Students who take this course should already be familiar with the basics of programming and are expected to spend considerable time during the semester programming short assignments and a final project. The course objectives are 1) to teach computational thinking through programming, 2) to familiarize students with the development environment and language for web applications (i.e., JavaScript), and 3) to practice with common programming paradigms such as Object-Oriented Programming, Functional Programming, and Event-Driven Programming.
content:
